title: Calibrate a Measuring Instrument
description: A quality technician needs to perform and log the calibration of a digital caliper.

tasks.description: Retrieve the calibration procedure and specifications for the digital caliper from the document management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the standard operating procedure (SOP) for calibration.

tasks.description: Perform the calibration using gauge blocks and record the 'as-found' and 'as-left' measurements.
Log the calibration event in the asset management system, update the next calibration due date, and print a new calibration sticker.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs the event, and the system shows the new due date.
